alert.note: Alert for Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 24 at 8:09PM CDT until June 24 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Wells County in south central North Dakota... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 809 PM CDT, Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen from previous thunderstorms. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bremen, Manfred and Hamberg. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
